name: Mini Army
description:
A game where you control a mini army

This game was made for the mini game jam 10

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-10-micro-

-The lore is that you and your mini people have been slaves to the great giants so you rebel against the endless horde

-Controls 

right click to move your troops 

left click to buy units(click on the buttons)

press space to shoot the archer bullets

-Also this game is buggy and unbalanced
